newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Czech CEZ sees 1997 net profit around CZK six bln.
newsitem.headline: Czech CEZ sees 1997 net profit around CZK six bln.

text.p: Czech electricity generator CEZ a.s. on Friday said it expects its 1997 net profit to fall to around "the six billion crown" level.

"Net profit will decline to the level of about six billion crowns, which is in line with our long-term expectations of a shift of internal sources from profit to write-offs," Petr Voboril, head of CEZ's planning section, told a news conference.
He did not say whether he was referring to profit calculated according to Czech or international accounting standards.
